moreBlocks.representativeClients:
• Car Accident, Head Injury- Settlement for a family involved in a 35 car pile-up on 93 in New Hampshire. The father and son sustained a head injury.
  • Car Accident, Neck Surgery- Settlement for a husband and wife who were side swiped on 93 in New Hampshire. The husband required extensive neck surgery and the wife sustained a head injury.
  • Car Accident, Fibromyalgia- Settlement for a family T-boned in their vehicle. The young mother went on to develop fibromyalgia.
  • Medical Negligence, Acoustic Neuroma (noncancerous growth in the brain)- Settlement for a man who lost hearing in one ear because radiologist failed to identify a noncancerous growth in his brain. Because of the physicians failure to diagnose the growth it was allowed to grow very large over several years.
  • Negligence, Severe Burns- Settlement for a young man who was severely burnt when a fire log exploded as he placed it in the fire place. He sustained first and second degree burns to his face, neck, and arms.
  • Medical Negligence, Wrongful Death- Jury verdict for a man who died after gastric bypass surgery.
  • Medical Negligence, Collapsed Lung- Settlement for a woman who suffered a collapsed lung during acupuncture.
  • Negligence, Fractured Tibia Settlement for a man who slipped and fell on ice that was allowed to accumulate at a condominium development. He suffered a fractured leg.
  • Negligence, Aggravation of Pre-existing Condition- Settlement for a woman who slipped and fell on water allowed to accumulate in a store during a rain storm. This aggravated her per-existing low back pain and sciatica.
  • Negligence, Failure to Plow and Shovel Properly- Settlement for a woman who fell and fractured her wrist due to the failure of a plow company to properly plow, shovel and sand a parking lot.

description:
I am Attorney Christine M. Smith, and I founded my law firm, the Law Office of Christine M. Smith, R.N., M.S.N., J.D., LLC with the intent of providing  my clients with high-quality legal representation, and individual attention.

What sets my law firm apart from the competition is that I am also a Registered Nurse with over 25 years of experience which gives me what I call “the power of perspective.”  While I am familiar with the litigation process, and the medicine involved in a personal injury case, I understand that it can be intimidating and confusing. I want my clients to know that I am here working for them, and they should always feel comfortable to call me with any questions.

I have successfully handled complex civil litigation involving medical issues either through settlement or jury trials. I place a high value on my individual clients and take great pride in the attention given to the legal matters of clients as I represent them.

 

                        Currently I handle legal matters involving:

 

                        Personal injury, such as car accidents or falls

                        Medical malpractice injuries

                        Wrongful death

                        Nursing Home abuse and neglect

 

To all of my clients I promise prompt, professional legal services.
